
```{r}
df <- read.csv("Tetuan City power consumption.csv")
head(df)

```

```{r}
df$DateTime <- as.POSIXct(df$DateTime,format="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M")
plot(df$DateTime, df$Zone.1.Power.Consumption, , ylab = "Monthly power consumption in zone 1", xlab = "2017" , main = "Tetoun City monthly power consumption in 2017", lwd=0.5, type="l")
```

```{r}
corrplot(cor(df[,2:7]), title = "Corrplot")
```
